entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 17. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow this evening. Clearing overnight. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 20 this evening and minus 25 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Sunday 25 December 2022
